General.Name: Fenerbahce Futbol AS
General.Description: Fenerbahçe Futbol A.S. provides commercial and related services for football club in Turkey. The company operates through Football activity and Merchandising segments. It distributes, markets, and sells Fenerbahce licensed products through stores, corners, and website. Fenerbahçe Futbol A.S. was founded in 1907 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Fenerbahçe Futbol A.S. is a subsidiary of Fenerbahçe Spor Kulübü.
General.Address: Fenerbahçe Sükrü Saraçoglu Stadium, Istanbul, Turkey, 34724
